1.title: John Paul Dejoria
1.plot: Follow billionaire entrepreneur John Paul DeJoria from LA to Texas to discover the secrets to his success.

2.title: Lyor Cohen
2.plot: Find out how music mogul Lyor Cohen's new label makes a profit in an era of massive change in the industry.

3.title: Gary Vaynerchuk
3.plot: Farnoosh Torabi tracks social media ad whiz and visionary Gary Vaynerchuk over several days.

4.title: Katia Beauchamp
4.plot: Business journalist Farnoosh Torabi spends 48 hours with Katia Beauchamp, Founder of beauty retailer Birchbox.

5.title: Neil Blumenthal and Dave Gilboa
5.plot: Farnoosh goes in-depth with Neil Blumenthal and Dave Gilboa, Co-CEOs and Co-Founders of Warby Parker

6.title: Tracy Anderson
6.plot: Farnoosh Torabi follows fitness mogul Tracy Anderson to see how this former fitness trainer has transformed into an ultra-successful businesswoman.

imdb.plot outline: In each 30-minute episode of Follow the Leader, host Farnoosh Torabi, will spend 72 hours embedded in the life of a different superstar entrepreneur to learn how this wildly successful businessperson ticks. Farnoosh's mission is to dig deep and discover their individual philosophies, methods and practices to earn big bucks - and viewers can take away this knowledge and apply it to their own lives. Along the way, Farnoosh will find out what makes these brilliant earners special - are they more driven, smarter, more ruthless, and more charismatic than the rest of us? Farnoosh will take viewers on a journey around the world to find out. Featured entrepreneurs include John Paul DeJoria, Co-Founder & Chairman of the Board, John Paul Mitchell Systems and The Patrón Spirits Company; Gary Vaynerchuk, CEO of VaynerMedia, serial entrepreneur and investor; Lyor Cohen, CEO, 300 Entertainment; and many more.
imdb.title: Follow the Leader
plot: In each 30-minute episode of _Follow the Leader_ (qv), host Farnoosh Torabi, will spend 72 hours embedded in the life of a different superstar entrepreneur to learn how this wildly successful businessperson ticks. Farnoosh's mission is to dig deep and discover their individual philosophies, methods and practices to earn big bucks - and viewers can take away this knowledge and apply it to their own lives. Along the way, Farnoosh will find out what makes these brilliant earners special - are they more driven, smarter, more ruthless, and more charismatic than the rest of us? Farnoosh will take viewers on a journey around the world to find out. Featured entrepreneurs include John Paul DeJoria, Co-Founder & Chairman of the Board, John Paul Mitchell Systems and The Patrón Spirits Company; Gary Vaynerchuk, CEO of VaynerMedia, serial entrepreneur and investor; Lyor Cohen, CEO, 300 Entertainment; and many more.
